name: Sailors
description:
A 3D top-down cooperative/competitive cartoon survival game made in Unreal 4 (demo).

It tells the tale of a merry band of buccaneers riding the seas in search of many riches. A stormy day was all it took to break their ship down, and the crew with nowhere to go was forced to embrace the life of castaway! They have to cooperate in order to gather resources and build their way out of near-certain death. But, pirates they wouldn't be if they didn't take this opportunity to settle some old scores! As one of them, you will have to cooperate, betray and watch out for betrayal. Moreover, there seems to be added to the crew, a "one too many" pirate that wants nothing good for either of you.

You must be connected to steam to be able to play in multiplayer !

CocoCorp TEAM

Devs: Vincent Debuissi, Nicolas Puissant

Artists: Laura Houdié, Théo Saragas, Kevin Michel

Sounds: Florian Dumas

Special thanks: Elioth Benard, Maxime Jumelle, Julien Herr, William Moiriat
